wikipedia_page.main: James Anthony Charles Corbett, (born 12 December 1978), is an English author and journalist, best known for his writing about Everton F.C.

response: * James Corbett - former political editor; now contributing editor of The Observer Sport Monthly and author of Everton: The School of Science and England Expects
*James Corbett (author) (born 1978), English author, wrote histories of English football
*Jim Corbett (Edward James Corbett, 1875–1955), British hunter, conservationist, and author, Man-Eaters of Kumaon

In June 2009, Hula and his team launched World Football INSIDER, the first online publication focusing on the business of world soccer. Hula built one of the strongest editorial benches in the business, hiring two of Europe's most highly respected football writers, Mark Bisson and James Corbett (author) as editor and correspondent respectively. World Football Insider carries on the tradition of quality, in-depth reporting for which Around the Rings is acclaimed.
